World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2023 年 12 月 24 日星期日 20:56:50 GMT 120
Israeli air strike kills at least 60 Palestinians in central Gaza refugee camp, Palestinian health officials sayThe death toll following an Israeli air strike that hit central Gaza's Maghazi refugee camp has risen to 60 people, Palestinian health ministry spokesman Ashraf al-Qudra said, adding that the death toll was likely to climb. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 20:36:12 GMT ITYJ6UAPCZKVNBUFY2FF5D6JZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-air-strike-kills-least-60-palestinians-central-gaza-refugee-camp-2023-12-24/Reuters世界中东
Israel says five Gaza hostages found dead in tunnelFive Israeli hostages killed in Hamas captivity were recovered from an underground tunnel network in the northern Gaza Strip, the military said on Sunday, showing footage of a white-tiled bathroom and work room linked by dark concrete-lined passages. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 19:47:43 GMT SQVPPNLOTVJ4PN3YRIYQRWQEFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-says- Five-gaza-hostages-died-tunnel-circumstances-being-probed-2023-12-24/Dan Williams世界中东
On Christmas eve, Pope Francis laments 'futile' war in Holy LandPope Francis on Sunday lamented that Jesus' message of peace was being drowned out by the "futile logic of war" in the very land where he was born, as the pontiff led the world's Roman Catholics into Christmas. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 19:43:30 GMT 7B2FV3GULJIJJPP2SGAXLA26VI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/christmas-eve-pope-francis-laments-futile-war-holy-land-2023-12-24/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Shipping giant Maersk prepares to resume operations in Red SeaDenmark's Maersk is preparing to resume shipping operations in the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden, the company said on Sunday, citing the deployment of a U.S.-led military operation designed to ensure the safety of commerce in the area. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 19:35:37 GMT L4LUPOCU2JLEPOONI4BGVXQ56M https://www.reuters.com/world/shipping-giant-maersk-prepares-resume-operations-red-sea-2023-12-24/Reuters世界
Thousands protest in Belgrade to demand annulment of electionsThousands gathered in the centre of Belgrade in an anti-government protest on Sunday to demand the annulment of parliamentary and local elections a week ago that international observers said were unfair. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 19:02:33 GMT 2VCO2WE4DRIAREKUQD3XB333IE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thousands-protest-belgrade-demand-elections-annulled-2023-12-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Chad votes yes to new constitution backed by juntaChadians have voted in favour of a new constitution that critics say could help cement the power of junta leader Mahamat Idriss Deby. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 18:07:50 GMT C6T3NDK7JZLJ3NUQNVQIT7XIQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/chad-votes-yes-new-constitution-backed-by-junta-2023-12-24/Mahamat Ramadane世界非洲
Russia says it downs four Ukrainian military aircraftRussia's defence ministry said on Sunday its air defence systems had shot down four Ukrainian military aircraft over the past 24 hours, just two days after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said Kyiv had downed three Russian fighter-bomber jets. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 15:37:13 GMT P3K4V6IJCNJZVPQSPETOCIPQII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-downs-four-ukrainian-military-aircraft-2023-12-24/Reuters世界欧洲
UK to send naval ship to Guyana amid Venezuela border disputeBritain will deploy a naval ship off Guyana later this month, its ministry of defence said on Sunday, as the South American nation faces a border dispute with neighbour Venezuela over the oil-rich Essequibo region. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 13:59:24 GMT PREELT7FFJLPDDU4334PFVQ4NI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/uk-send-naval-ship-guyana-amid-venezuela-border-dispute-2023-12-24/Reuters世界美洲
Ukraine's new Christmas Day unites Catholic-Orthodox familyA cultural shift is erasing traces of Russian influence as Ukraine fends off Moscow's invasion. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 13:24:08 GMT BO3FEU66CJNV7LTKR6PNMS7E7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-new-christmas-day-unites-catholic-orthodox-family-2023-12-24/Margaryta Chornokondratenko, Yurii Kovalenko世界欧洲
Thousands march in Rabat demanding end to Morocco-Israel tiesThousands of protesters staged one of the largest pro-Palestinian marches in Rabat on Sunday since the outbreak of the war in Gaza, demanding an end to Morocco's ties with Israel. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 13:10:05 GMT VYNA6BEVD5JNTDCQAU23PTEVYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/thousands-march-rabat-demanding-end-morocco-israel-ties-2023-12-24/Reuters世界中东
Gaza workers wrap bodies in shrouds in bombed-out northern GazaOn a patch of sandy ground between collapsed masonry, burnt out buildings and damaged cars, civil defence workers move from body to body, wrapping white shrouds around a group of people killed in Gaza's 11-week-old war. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 11:51:52 GMT ZFHK3SFJAZK47O4WWLEV3IQP5A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-workers-wrap-bodies-shrouds-bombed-out-northern-gaza-2023-12-24/Bassam Masoud世界中东
